Text.Page:
Yeah, I'll pay to have you bug someone else, but it's pay, not a handout.

When the pirates chased me here, I had to jettison some of my cargo to stay ahead of them.

It washed up on the beach, just down that staircase east of the village. Bring them to {@LinkCreature:212#1002$$Sidara}, who'll pay you to stay away.

You recovered more than Dirken thought you would. Wait a minute...no wonder! You recovered crates that don't belong to us.

This one belongs to that blasted regiment. Hmm....

Finders keepers, eh? You're getting paid, so as far as I'm concerned, that makes it private between us. Are you picking up what I'm putting down?

Why are you here? Unlike a soldier, I don't get paid to stand in one place and let teenagers admire the uniform.

I work for a living. You could work for a living, too, if you got those crates over on the beach.
